law.catch_line: Effect of conviction for forgery on forged instrument.
law.text: Judgment of conviction for forgery shall not destroy the legal validity of the writing charged to have been forged, nor shall the conviction be used as evidence in any civil controversy relative to the writing.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1131.
